[`FileSystemAdapter`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/FileSystemAdapter.md)

## FileSystemAdapter class

Implementation of the vault adapter for desktop.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export class FileSystemAdapter implements DataAdapter 
```
**Implements:** [`DataAdapter`](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/DataAdapter.md)
